full_summary:
---------------------------------------------------------

# Tender Opportunity for Aircraft Equipment

## Tender Number and Reference

Tender Number: WS4430102467
Reference Number: WS4430102467-Doc4430370332

## Tender Status

This tender opportunity has expired.

## Description

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is seeking the following items for the Transport Canada (TC) Air Services Directorate (ASD):

- PN: 2100-4043-00 FDR
- TO COMPLY WITH SB604-31-016FDR

The procurement of the mentioned items is only open to Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders for the T8493-140035 series. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Aero Supplies Inc
* Non-Destructive Testing Products Ltd
* Execaire
* Maxcraft Avionics Ltd.
* MHD Rockland
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Ltd.
* Pole Air Aviation
* Simex Defence Inc
* Tower Aerospace
* Tulmar Safety
* Unisource Technology Inc
* Zepoli International Inc
* PHP Canada
* BSF International Inc
* Avmax Aviation
* Field Aviation
* JHT Defense
* Newcastle Aviation Partners LLC
* Southeast Aerospace
* Canada West Avionics
* CanRep Inc.
* Voyageur Avparts Inc.
* Genaire LTD
* Kitchener Aero (dba Mid-Canada Mod Center)
* Tronosjet Maintenance
* Aero Technical Components
* Arnprior Aerospace
* Pratt & Whitney Canada
* ALLCLEAR AEROSPACE & DEFENSE, INC.
* Bristow Instruments (1977) Ltd
* CASP Aerospace Inc

## Contract Details

The expected contract start date is 2024-02-16, and the expected contract end date is 2024-03-31.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Edmond Egikian, PSPC/SPAC
Email: edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Documents

Please note that there are no attachments or documents available for this tender opportunity.

---------------------------------------------------------
